/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the tranquil atmosphere of the city. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the path below. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting its warm glow through the foliage, illuminating the scene with a soft, inviting light. The image beautifully encapsulates the harmony between nature and urban life in Beijing.
